tool_description: This API returns interesting facts about any specified topic. By providing the name of the topic, users can receive a list of facts generated using Chat GPT technology.

api_list.name: Health Check Endpoint
api_list.description: This endpoint checks the health of the service and returns a successful response if the service is operational.

api_list.name: Get list of interesting facts
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of 5 interesting facts related to the specified topic.

required_parameters.name: key
required_parameters.description: The API key required for authentication.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the topic for which facts are requested.
